title: Spicy sweet potatoes with red beans & coriander raita

ingredients.item: 395g can essential Waitrose Red Kidney Beans In Chilli Sauce
1 tsp red or white wine vinegar

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220Â°C, gas mark 7. Cut each sweet potato into 3 chunky pieces. Brush lightly on both sides with half the olive oil and place, cut-side up in a roasting tin. Sprinkle with the cumin and a little black pepper. Bake in the oven for 30 minutes until tender.

Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil in a pan and fry the onion for 5 minutes until softened and lightly browned. Stir in the beans and sauce, and 1 tbsp of the coriander. Cook gently for 4-5 minutes. Add the tomatoes and vinegar and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir the remaining coriander, garlic and a little black pepper into the yogurt. Transfer the sweet potatoes to serving plates and top with the bean sauce. Serve with the coriander raita.
